itemDisplayName: Create an new AD Domain with 2 Windows Server 2016 Domain Controllers
description: This template creates 2 new VMs to be AD DCs (primary and backup) for a new Forest and Domain, fixes are: DomainNetBIOSName to reflect domains in internal.domain.co.uk format. Address Typos with items, look at the naming conventions, allow options to be presented within ARM for more user control.
summary: This template creates 2 Azure VMs with AD
